title.narrative: PROGRAMME PLANNING, MONITORING & REPORTING ON RESULTS

description.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes and report on results, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: India Country Programme is effectively and efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

sector.narrative: Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively plan and monitor programmes and report on results

description.narrative: RBM capacities strengthened and principles operationalized through the roll out of the de-centralized RAM-India PMR tool; Partnership management (HACT) improved with eTools adoption. Budget management consistently maintained with circulation of key products and donor reporting streamlined with SoPs and Knowledge management enhanced with development of an office wide strategy. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of Common Planning cum Review platforms or systems (e.g. MTR, end of year and strategic moments of reflection, etc.) between UNICEF, Government and other stakeholder strengthened for effective programming
Number of states that have functional common review mechanism with frameworks available for periodically monitoring the status of children and women in the state
Number of innovations and ICT platforms established or strengthen in states and national level for effective monitoring and reporting on the children
